statements: SELECT * FROM customer_credit_scores;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_score < 600 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_history FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT AVG(credit_score) as average_score, COUNT(customer_id) as total_customers FROM customer_credit_scores;
SELECT * FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800 ORDER BY credit_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, credit_history FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_history LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 600 AND credit_history ILIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_history IS NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT * FROM CustomerCreditScores;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CustomerCreditScores;
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CustomerCreditHistory;
SELECT * FROM CustomerCreditHistory WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, repayment_history FROM CustomerCreditHistory;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CustomerCreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM CustomerCreditHistory WHERE credit_limit >= 5000;
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CustomerCreditHistory WHERE credit_limit BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CustomerCreditScores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, credit_limit FROM CustomerCreditScores JOIN CustomerCreditHistory ON CustomerCreditScores.customer_id = CustomerCreditHistory.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerCreditScores;
SELECT credit_score FROM CustomerCreditScores WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM LoanHistories WHERE loan_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, credit_limit FROM CreditCardHistories WHERE card_type = 'Gold';
SELECT * FROM CustomerCreditScores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerCreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CustomerCreditScores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, loan_amount FROM CustomerCreditScores JOIN LoanHistories ON CustomerCreditScores.customer_id = LoanHistories.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, card_type FROM CustomerCreditScores JOIN CreditCardHistories ON CustomerCreditScores.customer_id = CreditCardHistories.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(credit_score) AS avg_credit_score FROM CustomerCreditScores GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(credit_score) > 650;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM customers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_name, credit_limit FROM customers ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT customer_name, card_type FROM customers INNER JOIN credit_cards ON customers.customer_id = credit_cards.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM customers INNER JOIN credit_history ON customers.customer_id = credit_history.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM customers ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, credit_limit FROM customers WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loans;
SELECT customer_name, card_limit FROM customers JOIN credit_cards ON customers.customer_id = credit_cards.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_type FROM customers JOIN credit_history ON customers.customer_id = credit_history.customer_id WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'approved';
SELECT payment_id, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT card_limit, card_status FROM credit_cards WHERE customer_id = 3;

SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_status='approved';
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id;
